descriptionHtml:
Fate and Volition weapon sets
+++++++++++++++
Made by congtuan999
+++++++++++++++

DESCRIPTION

Adds 2 craftable weapons set to Skyrim.
First time it name was "Fantasy cities weapon only update 1" I made for my first weapon mod "Fantasy cities weapon only" but i change it name lately becasue i try to make a first weapons set mod.
Those set can glow at night and have a special glow color at day like Fate set glow cyan and Volition set glow red.
This is just a simple mod add 24 craftable weapon to Skyrim.
10 weapon type each set.
+Trident.
+Greatsword.
+Sword.
+Battleaxe.
+Chakram (use like dagger it just float when you equipt it:)
+Dagger.
+Scythe.
+Warhammer.
+Waraxe.
+Mace.
+++++++++++++++

LOCATION

Weapons can be craft in the smithing under "Elven" and "Daedric" category.
+++++++++++++++

INSTALL

Put the DATA folder in your main installation directory of Skyrim so that the folders line up.
+++++++++++++++

UNISTALL

Delete the esp and the folders you put in there. They are
data/meshes/weapons/Fate Weapons Collection.
and
data/textures/weapons/Fate Weapons Collection.
+++++++++++++++

TOOLS USED

Creation kit
Gimp
Nifskope
+++++++++++++++
Thank you to everyone who watch this mod if you like you can visit Fantasy cities weapons only for more weapon if you get problem with this mod try to move your game to D/Program Files
author: congtuan999
